name: Httpalooza
tagline: Ruby's greatest HTTP clients, on stage together
body:
### Time to use your Ruby HTTP Clients

Does your `Gemfile.lock` look like this?

```
    em-http-request (1.1.1)
      addressable (>= 2.3.4)
      cookiejar
      em-socksify (>= 0.3)
      eventmachine (>= 1.0.3)
      http_parser.rb (>= 0.6.0.beta.2)
    faraday (0.9.2)
      multipart-post (>= 1.2, < 3)
    httparty (0.13.7)
      json (~> 1.8)
      multi_xml (>= 0.5.2)
    httpclient (2.4.0)
```

Time to make use of those HTTP clients. **Enter httpalooza.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
